 /* Style Definitions */
 p.MsoNormal, li.MsoNormal, div.MsoNormal
	{mso-style-unhide:no;
	mso-style-qformat:yes;
	mso-style-parent:"";

	font-size:12.0pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman","serif";
	mso-fareast-font-family:Batang;}
h3

h4

p.MsoBodyText2, li.MsoBodyText2, div.MsoBodyText2

	margin:0in;
	margin-bottom:.0001pt;

	line-height:10.0pt;

	mso-pagination:none;
	word-break:break-all;
	font-size:8.0pt;
	mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
	font-family:"Book Antiqua","serif";
	mso-fareast-font-family:Batang;
	mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-font-kerning:1.0pt;}
a:link, span.MsoHyperlink
	{mso-style-unhide:no;

	text-underline:single;}
a:visited, span.MsoHyperlinkFollowed

p

span.Heading3Char
	{mso-style-name:"Heading 3 Char";

	mso-style-locked:yes;
	mso-style-link:"Heading 3";

span.Heading4Char

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><span
class=SpellE><span class=GramE><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span

"Book Antiqua","serif";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:
CMBX12;color:black;mso-themecolor:text1'>for Cross-layer Tuning <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:24.0pt;font-family:
"Book Antiqua","serif";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:
CMBX12;color:black;mso-themecolor:text1'>of Mobile Real-time Embedded Systems</span></b><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:24.0pt;font-family:
"Book Antiqua","serif";color:black;mso-themecolor:text1'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:24.0pt;font-family:"Book Antiqua","serif"'><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-family:"Book Antiqua","serif"'>[Home] <a

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><a
name=research><span style='font-family:"Book Antiqua","serif";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:CMR12'><o:p> </o:p></span></a></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><span
style='mso-bookmark:research'><span style='font-family:"Book Antiqua","serif";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:CMR12'>Resource
limited mobile real-time embedded systems can benefit greatly from dynamic<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><span
style='mso-bookmark:research'><span class=GramE><span style='font-family:"Book Antiqua","serif";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:CMR12'>adaptation</span></span></span><span
style='mso-bookmark:research'><span style='font-family:"Book Antiqua","serif";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:CMR12'> of
system parameters. This thesis proposes a novel framework,<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><span
style='mso-bookmark:research'><span class=SpellE><span class=GramE><span
style='font-family:"Book Antiqua","serif";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-bidi-font-family:CMR12'>xTune</span></span></span></span><span
style='mso-bookmark:research'><span style='font-family:"Book Antiqua","serif";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:CMR12'>, that
employs iterative tuning using light-weight formal verification at runtime<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><span
style='mso-bookmark:research'><span class=GramE><span style='font-family:"Book Antiqua","serif";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:CMR12'>with</span></span></span><span
style='mso-bookmark:research'><span style='font-family:"Book Antiqua","serif";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:CMR12'> feedback
for dynamic adaptation of mobile real-time embedded systems.<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><span
style='mso-bookmark:research'><span style='font-family:"Book Antiqua","serif";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:CMR12'>One
objective of this approach is to enable tradeoff analysis across multiple
layers of<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><span
style='mso-bookmark:research'><span class=GramE><span style='font-family:"Book Antiqua","serif";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:CMR12'>abstraction</span></span></span><span
style='mso-bookmark:research'><span style='font-family:"Book Antiqua","serif";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:CMR12'> (for
example, application, middleware, operating system) and predict the<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><span
style='mso-bookmark:research'><span class=GramE><span style='font-family:"Book Antiqua","serif";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:CMR12'>possible</span></span></span><span
style='mso-bookmark:research'><span style='font-family:"Book Antiqua","serif";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:CMR12'> property
violations as the system evolves dynamically over time. Specifically, <o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><span
style='mso-bookmark:research'><span class=GramE><span style='font-family:"Book Antiqua","serif";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:CMR12'>an</span></span></span><span
style='mso-bookmark:research'><span style='font-family:"Book Antiqua","serif";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:CMR12'> executable
formal specification is developed for each layer of the mobile real-time<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><span
style='mso-bookmark:research'><span class=GramE><span style='font-family:"Book Antiqua","serif";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:CMR12'>system</span></span></span><span
style='mso-bookmark:research'><span style='font-family:"Book Antiqua","serif";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:CMR12'> under
consideration. The formal specification is then analyzed using statistical<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><span
style='mso-bookmark:research'><span class=GramE><span style='font-family:"Book Antiqua","serif";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:CMR12'>model</span></span></span><span
style='mso-bookmark:research'><span style='font-family:"Book Antiqua","serif";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:CMR12'> checking
and statistical quantitative analysis, to determine the impact of<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><span
style='mso-bookmark:research'><span class=GramE><span style='font-family:"Book Antiqua","serif";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:CMR12'>various</span></span></span><span
style='mso-bookmark:research'><span style='font-family:"Book Antiqua","serif";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:CMR12'> resource
management policies for achieving a variety of end-to-end properties<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><span
style='mso-bookmark:research'><span class=GramE><span style='font-family:"Book Antiqua","serif";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:CMR12'>in</span></span></span><span
style='mso-bookmark:research'><span style='font-family:"Book Antiqua","serif";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:CMR12'> a
quantifiable manner. The integration of formal analysis with dynamic behavior<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><span
style='mso-bookmark:research'><span class=GramE><span style='font-family:"Book Antiqua","serif";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:CMR12'>from</span></span></span><span
style='mso-bookmark:research'><span style='font-family:"Book Antiqua","serif";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:CMR12'> system
execution results in a feedback loop that enables model refinement and<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><span
style='mso-bookmark:research'><span class=GramE><span style='font-family:"Book Antiqua","serif";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:CMR12'>further</span></span></span><span
style='mso-bookmark:research'><span style='font-family:"Book Antiqua","serif";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:CMR12'> optimization
of policies and parameters. Finally, we propose a composition<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><span
style='mso-bookmark:research'><span class=GramE><span style='font-family:"Book Antiqua","serif";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:CMR12'>method</span></span></span><span
style='mso-bookmark:research'><span style='font-family:"Book Antiqua","serif";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:CMR12'> for
coordinated interaction of optimizers at different abstraction layers. The<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><span
style='mso-bookmark:research'><span class=GramE><span style='font-family:"Book Antiqua","serif";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:CMR12'>core</span></span></span><span
style='mso-bookmark:research'><span style='font-family:"Book Antiqua","serif";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:CMR12'> idea of
our approach is that each participating optimizer can restrict its own
parameters<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><span
style='mso-bookmark:research'><span class=GramE><span style='font-family:"Book Antiqua","serif";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:CMR12'>and</span></span></span><span
style='mso-bookmark:research'><span style='font-family:"Book Antiqua","serif";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:CMR12'> exchange
refined parameters with its associated layers. We demonstrate<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><span
style='mso-bookmark:research'><span class=GramE><span style='font-family:"Book Antiqua","serif";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:CMR12'>the</span></span></span><span
style='mso-bookmark:research'><span style='font-family:"Book Antiqua","serif";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:CMR12'>
applicability of the proposed methodology to the adaptive provisioning of
mobile<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><span
style='mso-bookmark:research'><span class=GramE><span style='font-family:"Book Antiqua","serif";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:CMR12'>real-time</span></span></span><span
style='mso-bookmark:research'><span style='font-family:"Book Antiqua","serif";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:CMR12'> embedded
systems through a multimedia case study on resource-limited<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><span
style='mso-bookmark:research'><span class=GramE><span style='font-family:"Book Antiqua","serif";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:CMR12'>mobile</span></span></span><span
style='mso-bookmark:research'><span style='font-family:"Book Antiqua","serif";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:CMR12'> devices.<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>
